name: Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America
bossPosition: Executive Vice President, General Counsel, and Secretary
goal: Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America (PhRMA) represents the country's leading pharmaceutical research and biotechnology companies, which are devoted to inventing medicines that allow patients to live longer, healthier, and more productive lives. PhRMA's mission is to conduct effective advocacy for public policies that encourage discovery of important new medicines for patients by pharmaceutical and biotechnology research companies.
interests: External Relations, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: European Commission health, pharmaceutical, and intellectual property policies, including supplementary protection certificates (SPC) legislation, EMA and clinical trial policy reforms, and trade policy.  European public consultation on SPCs and patent research exemptions.
